short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist RSS feed reader for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimalist RSS feed reader that shows just the images, video, social posts, and other media from feeds and from its link. It's great for photo blogs, Reddit feeds, and YouTube channels.

You can create filters for junk media you don't want to see. You can also create content filters to block posts with keywords in the title.

Media support: animated gifs, images, video

Supports many embeds from popular sites.
